channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CO

item.title: Report X-2023080681
item.description:
Report X-2023080681

  • City: HENDERSON

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Fully Regulated package came to QA soiled due to loose caps on the bottles. DescribePack: Loose caps allowed liquid to leak. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in tote and brought to QA for inspection.

item.title: Report X-2023080626
item.description:
Report X-2023080626

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-31T21:11:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-02
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023080626 SequenceEvent: Package came to QA wet DescribePack: Loose caps DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Fully regulated package came to QA wet after inspecting package found loose caps on 4/4 bottles of 70% isopropanol alcohol causing leakage to box. 2. X-2023080628 SequenceEvent: Package came to QA wet DescribePack: Loose caps DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Fully regulated package came to QA wet after inspecting package found loose caps on 4/4 bottles of Muriatic Acid causing leakage to box.
